Description.div:
The OrderHeaderKey, or the EnterpriseCode, DocumentType and the OrderNo must be passed to identify the Order.
DocumentType should be a valid return DocumentType.

Attribute.Name: DetermineOrdersForReturn
Attribute.Description:
Determines whether the API should search for sales orders for associating to the return order. Default: Y
Valid Values
Y - Search for sales order for associating to the return order.
N - Skip the search for sales orders. Any charges on the return order line or header containing charge breakup record(s) will be reset to zero while also deleting all the charge breakup records so that they are recomputed.

Attribute.Name: ExecuteReturnPolicy
Attribute.Description:
Determines whether the return policies should be executed as part of this API call. Default: Y
Valid Values
Y - Execute each configured return policy.
N - Skip return policy execution.

Description.div:
Default: N
Valid Values:
N - Process the return order and save the changes.
Y - Process the return order but do not save the changes. Used to get information on refund amount.

Attribute.Name: SegregateBlindRefund
Attribute.Description:
Determines whether the API should consider blind order lines separately for refunding. Default: N
Valid Values
Y - Refund blind order line total to default refund payment method configured in the system.
N - Do not differenciate blind order lines and associated order lines for refund.
